definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: Inf. cstr. [[לַעֲבׂט]] De 24:10 to take possession of a thing pledged (c. acc. cogn.); Impf. 2 ms. give a pledge [[תַּעֲבׂט]] De 15:6 (i.e. borrow).

definitions.title: Hiph.
definitions.body: Pf. 2 ms. [[וְהַעֲבַטְתָּ֫ גּוֹיִם רַבִּים]] v:De 15:6 and thou shalt cause many nations to give pledges (i.e. lend to them); Impf. 3 ms. sf. + Inf. abs. [[הַעֲבֵט תַּעֲבִיטֶנּוּ]] v:De 15:8 thou shalt surely lend to him (lit. as above).

definitions.title: Pi.
definitions.body: Impf. [[יְעַבְּטוּן]] Joe 2:7 hardly makes sense (lend on pledge = interchange ?); most rd. [[יְעַבְּתוּן]]; [[יְעַוְּתוּן]] We, cf. Now Dr GASm; Gr. [[יַטוּן]].
